description: This endowment was established in 2009 for the contributions of industry artists, such as the band Coldplay, who made a generous contribution in 2010. Scholarships are awarded to students based on the potential impact they will make on the industry as an artist, producer or industry professional upon completion of the program. Eligibility ACM@UCO student Requirements AWARDED BY COMMITTEE NOMINATION. Nominated student(s) will be invited to apply by the college's scholarship coordinator.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
